ul.li:
Include ces codes sont définis dans 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.8.2.1
CodeDisplay
1626pN0: No regional lymph node metastasis
1627pN1: Unilateral metastasis in lymph node(s), 6 cm or less in greatest dimension, above the supraclavicular fossa
1628pN2: Bilateral metastasis in lymph node(s), 6 cm or less in greatest dimension, above the supraclavicular fossa
1629pN3: Metastasis in a lymph node greater than 6 cm and/or to supraclavicular fossa
1630pN3a: Greater than 6 cm in dimension
1631pN3b: Extension to the supraclavicular fossa
